column5: Is night fishing for lake trout good? IV never tried. I'm waiting for that opener.
Don't know.. but not the time of year I'd be playin on the ice in the dark...but that's just me. I'll be on a lake at sun up though.
I've had a lot of luck, including PB ( 16 pound +  )  fishing at night during the summer.  But we haven't fished with much success during the winter for nighttime lakers
I have a friend in BC that does well for lakers after dark, but I have not had much luck.
